Guys the torrent is fine, the problem is with the game itself. The initial version had a bug which meant it would only look at the first CD drive it found on a machine.

To fix it you just need to download this patch: http://www.sierra.com/publish/sierra/en/home/games/game_info.tab-downloadtab.prod-L2NvbnRlbnQvc2llcnJhL2VuL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2hvbWV3b3JsZF9fX2dhbWVfb2Y%3d.platform-global.html

and then the game runs fine :)

A quick note to newbies:

 When you download the file, you'll receive an MDF and MDS file. All this really is is a virtual image of the disk, the MDF being the data, and the MDS being the descriptor. To actually be able to use it, just download a program that is capable of mounting such files onto a virtual CD drive. 

 Alcohol 52% is an excellent tool for such a thing. It's free and can be found here http://trial.alcohol-soft.com/en/

 I won't walk you through using the program, as there are other sites out there to deal with that. 

 Good luck.

There's a god damn virus in this. It downloads as a file in the torrent but it's instantly placed in your temp folder as a mirror temp .exe.  when you try to install the game the virus automatically engages and your pc moves it from the temp folder because it uses it to read the .exe. It's placed very cleverly.     There's no crack or serial key in this shitty torrent anyway. lol

There is no virus in this package, and it works perfectly (am playing it now). 
The crack/serial can be found on page one of the comments.
Virus? I think not. If there's some crap with an exe going on, it's on your end.
